summary: In 1944 a group of women in an isolated Welsh village wake up to discover all of the their husbands have mysteriously vanished.
cast: Alexander Dreymon|Michael Sheen|Andrea Riseborough|Iwan Rheon|Tom Wlaschiha|Stanislav Yanevski|Kimberley Nixon|Anatole Taubman|Jassa Ahluwalia|Melanie Walters|Sharon Morgan|Tomos Eames|George Taylor|Simon Armstrong|Matt Hookings|Mossie Smith|Nia Gwynne|Alexandra Van Ufford|Luke Cadbury|Kerry Hutchinson
keywords: occupied country|welsh valley|resistance fighter|world war two|german invasion
title: Resistencia
